name: Cmeron F.
text: Better off to drive to minden or ruston for better pizza. Sad because pizza hut used to be really good and have great pizza. Now it's nothing like it used to be. The dine-in experience is a complete joke as well here. Yum! Brands, Inc. who owns it needs to make some serious changes otherwise they'll be going out of business.

name: Wade Verret
text: Wow.. Spent 20 bucks for wings and teeny pizza, and they will not give me a cup of water while dining in..  they'll sell a water, but they actually won't give you any. Screw you pizza hut, you just lost a customer.

name: Tammy Cole
text: Use to be better in 80s.  Cheezier use to be.

name: Whitney Henderson
text: I was not impressed with the customer service. I watched an employee who I'm assuming is the manager since she wasn't doing anything, bring another customer their food outside, yet she did not do the same for me. I feel that you should ‚Ä¶More

name: Sylvia Brown
text: Pizza was good, but no fountain sodas hot 20oz sodas. Have to get up get your own plates forks n napkins. No salad or salad bar. Not a good place to eat at maybe good for carry out.

name: Felecia White
text: Rude workers ..only one showed concern. This location does NOT sell fountain drinks so you will have to buy their high-priced 20 oz or 2 liter. Area was not clean even though nobody was in the restaurant eating. If you want a place for your family to sit down and enjoy a meal with family fun, this is DEFINITELY NOT the place.

name: Celeste Presley
text: I love pizza. The food here is good. Could use some improvement with sauce on wings...sometimes too dry. The workers are friendly and address u with a smile and calling you by your name. Good customer service.

name: Isaiah Pruitt
text: Usually pretty fast and good food.

name: Ms Rachel
text: Never want to deliever

name: FRSH PRNC
text: Thin & crispy pepperoni everytime!

name: Angela McCoy
text: The pizzas were very good, it was fast service, but the lady who took my phone order wasn't very knowledgeable or super friendly. It was a different story when we arrived to pick up the order, the staff was very friendly and efficient. Overall, it was a good experience and I would go back again. üòä

name: Mary Wren
text: We went. And dined in. It was awful.

name: Jenn Winn
text: Only sell bottled drinks now. No buffet. Miss the glory days of fresh salad bar, buffet and sweet tea with refills. Pizza Hut is just not what it use to be - especially at this location. Had hoped it would improve after exterior remodel. It didn't.

text: Very good food.  Great CS!!
